alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:51PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern White Pine and southern Elko Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 151 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Lages Junction, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern White Pine and southern Elko Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; White Pine County
